snippet: A Connecticut man found guilty of a 2006 triple murder was sentenced to death on Thursday in what was likely to be the last capital punishment sentence in the state....

headline.print_headline: Killer of Three May Be Last to Get Death Penalty in Connecticut
headline.main: Killer of Three May Be Last to Get Death Penalty in Connecticut

lead_paragraph: A Connecticut man found guilty of a 2006 triple murder was sentenced to death on Thursday in what was likely to be the last capital punishment sentence in the state.
